note: Formal education is primary/ISCED 1 or higher. This does not include years spent repeating grades. GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices.
title: Average years of schooling vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: The average years of schooling completed by individuals aged 25 and older. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
